name: diversio-manager-alerts
description: Manager alerts dashboard with hierarchical tree traversal

scripts.setup:backend: cd backend && python -m venv venv && .\venv\Scripts\python -m pip install -r requirements.txt && .\venv\Scripts\python manage.py migrate && .\venv\Scripts\python manage.py load_seed_data
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.predev: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('frontend/node_modules')||!fs.existsSync('backend/venv')){console.error('\n❌ Setup required! Run: npm run setup\n');process.exit(1)}" && npm install --silent
scripts.pretest: node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(!fs.existsSync('frontend/node_modules')||!fs.existsSync('backend/venv')){console.error('\n❌ Setup required before running tests! Run: npm run setup\n');process.exit(1)}"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
